mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry(inquiryNum, subject, content, regDate, answer, answerDate, processResult, memberId, farmNum, answerId) VALUES (inquiry_seq.NEXTVAL, #{subject}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{answer, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answerDate, jdbcType=DATE}, 0, #{memberId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{farmNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{answerId, jdbcType=NUMERIC})

i.farmNum = #{farmNum}
